# robots.txt for your site
# Replace https://rubitechnologies.in with your real site URL before deploying

User-agent: *
Allow: /
Sitemap: https://rubitechnologies.in/sitemap.xml

# Example: block an admin area (uncomment to enable)
# Disallow: /admin/

# Notes:
# - Place this file at the site root so it is available at https://rubitechnologies.in/robots.txt
# - After deploying, verify at https://rubitechnologies.in/robots.txt and submit the sitemap in Google Search Console
# - If you want, I can replace the example.com URL with your real domain and submit the sitemap for indexing.
